Version 11.2 Release Notes
Quote Section

2 min
modify product quotes from v11 2, the customers can now modify the quote requested until the quote is in the pending stage in addition, for the offline quotes, the admin will also have the provision to modify the quote product selections tax display in quote details in the quote details page, the admin can now add tax depending on the site configuration setting
Did this page help you?
